Services

Creating solutions for all your technical needs.

Web Design and Development

I can offer much more than just putting up a pretty web site. Sure, having a great looking site is important but there is so much more. I can help you with the project from initial design all the way through optimizing for search engines. A great site gets lots of visitors, keeps them there, and converts them into paying clients.

Technical Support

Offering comprehensive computer and network support services.

Consulting

Technology is so important today! If you questions about any technology or business I would be happy to help. If I don't know the answer then I'll find someone who does.

About

A brief summary of my work history.

  • 1986-2002

    My Humble Beginnings

    The first 15 or 16 years were spent honing my skills and expertise in electronics, mechanics, and robotics. I served in a variety of roles in 2 large businesses supporting manufacturing and new product design.

  • 2002-2009

    A Computer Tech is Born

Blog

Learning project from Dash tutorials. This is just a small blog project done as part of the General Assembly Dash tutorials. Just a basic static site with some responsive features. Skills learned- HTML CSS Javascript Responsive Design

  • Client: Static Blog Demo
  • Date: Jan 2015
  • Service: Web Development

Custom Cabinet

This is a responsive main front page for a woodworking, cabinet, kitchen, bathroom, design or other shop. Bootstrap was used as a base CSS but I would not say this site looks like a typical Bootstrap site. I also used Yeoman, Grunt, Bower to develop and build the site. This was developed as practice for using HTML/CSS/Javascript/jQuery skills.

  • Client: Project Site Template
  • Date: December 2014
  • Service: Web Development

Yoga Studio

This base template can be used as a single or multipage web site. Simply add your images, content, and other customizations. Navigation can be configured for single or multipage display.

  • Client: Sample Site Template
  • Date: November 2014
  • Service: Web Development
